FILE: cm002339v11.0.txt
DYAD: USA - ALBANIA
RIVALRY: RIV68
DISPUTE(S): MID2857 

PSNOTES: 
PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170731
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170731

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2857 

TERRMID: MID2857 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2857 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2857 from NYT 1/8/1958, a US jet was fired upon and forced down over Albania after illegally entering Albanian airspace. The plane was released soon thereafter. Coded not territory because the border was not disputed and the US was not challenging Albanian territorial sovereignty.

TERRLINK: MID2857 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2857 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2857 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2857 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2857 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2857 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2857 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2857 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2857 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2857 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2857 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2857 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2857 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2857 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

NYT 1/8/1958
